welcomePage.title: WOLips
welcomePage.item: New to WOLips? To learn more you can browse the WOLips User Guide.

What's new? Option to set the JVMOption in the WOApplication. Include/exclude patterns for the CLASSES and WOAPP_RESOURCES arrays in the PB.project. Enable/disable the update of the PB.project. Bugfix to prevent an update of the PB.project whenever you open or close a .java file. Javadoc in the help. Entry in the tips and tricks list. Welcome page. The WOLips perspective is the default welcome perspective. Preferences page for the launch config. New tab for the launch config. Action to add a framework from the user home. Action to add a framework from a expanded classpath variable. Patterns for the incremental builder. Optional ssdd target in the application build file.
Learn More This is the official site of woproject/WOLips: http://www.objectstyle.org/woproject
